title: Budget 2026 key numbers : Capex , fiscal deficit and more
description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will present the Union Budget for FY27 on February 1, focusing on growth, fiscal discipline, and reforms. Key numbers to watch include the fiscal deficit target, capital expenditure, debt reduction roadmap, borrowing program, tax revenue projections, and nominal GDP growth assumptions., Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will present the Union Budget for FY27 on February 1, focusing on growth, fiscal discipline, and reforms. Key numbers to watch include the fiscal deficit target, capital expenditure, debt reduction roadmap, borrowing program, tax revenue projections, and nominal GDP growth assumptions.
